definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: :Le 14:30) turtle-dove (onomatop.);—abs. [[תּׂר]] Ge 15:9 (J; + [[גּוֹזָל]]), Je 8:7 (as migratory); as sacrif. offering (RS:Sem. i. 202; 2nd ed. 219, 294) [usu. [[יוֹנׇה]] ([[בְּנֵי]])[[בֶּן ]]] Le 1:14, Le 5:7, Le 5:11, Le 12:6, Le 12:8, Le 14:22, Le 14:30, Le 15:14, Le 15:29, Nu 6:10 (all P; cf. also Ge 15:9); [[קוֹל הַתּוֹר]] Ct So 2:12; sf. [[תּוֹרֶָךָ]] Ps 74:19 (fig. of ´[[י]]:’s people).—Vid. Tristr:NHB 201 ff. Shiply-Cook:Ency. Bib. Dove Post:Hast. DB TURTLE-DOVE.—1. [[תּׂר]] v. 1. [[תּוֹר]]. p.1064
